title: A1369 screen
message: All screen for A1369 are interchangeable? 2010 and 2011 models?

title: A1369 screen
message:
Yes if you replace the LCD only

No if you replace complete display assembly (WiFi antenna cables different length)

title: A1369 screen
message: I mean if I replace complete assembly. 2010 and 2011 different?

title: A1369 screen
message:
Sorry. I think the 13-inch will fit. 

But the 11-inch 2010-display will not fit in 2011-board because of too short antenna cables.

title: A1369 screen
message: I sorta works, but compare the LCD connector pin outs on the schematic and tell me what may go wrong.

title: A1369 screen
message:

message:
